General.Name: CKH Food & Health Limited
General.Description: CKH Food & Health Limited manufactures and distributes health foods. It primarily offers Chinese medicine-based health supplements in capsule, tablet, drink, and tea forms. The company was formerly known as China King-Highway Holdings Limited and changed its name to CKH Food & Health Limited in 2013. CKH Food & Health Limited was founded in 2009 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Grand Pavilion, George Town, Cayman Islands, KYI-1205
